models.serviceOfferings: Public-facing service pages that showcase available offerings: Speaking, Coaching, Workshops, Masterclass, and Arrangements.

relationships: Service offerings are standalone public pages
Visitors can request bookings for any service offering
Service offerings can be featured on the homepage or linked from navigation

serviceOfferings.title: Speaking Engagements
serviceOfferings.tagline: Inspire your audience with expert insights on vocal performance and leadership
serviceOfferings.description: Dynamic keynote presentations and panel discussions on choral excellence, vocal technique, and music leadership. Perfect for conferences, conventions, and special events.

testimonial.quote: An electrifying speaker who brings both expertise and heart to every presentation.
testimonial.author: Dr. Maria Santos

serviceOfferings.title: Personal Coaching
serviceOfferings.tagline: One-on-one guidance to elevate your vocal artistry and leadership skills
serviceOfferings.description: Personalized coaching sessions for singers, conductors, and music educators seeking to refine their craft. Whether you're preparing for an audition, competition, or simply want to grow as an artist, receive expert guidance tailored to your goals.

testimonial.quote: The coaching I received transformed my approach to performance and gave me the confidence to audition at the highest level.
testimonial.author: James Chen

serviceOfferings.title: Group Workshops
serviceOfferings.tagline: Hands-on learning experiences for choirs and vocal groups of all levels
serviceOfferings.description: Intensive workshop sessions covering blend, intonation, musicality, and performance technique. Designed for choruses, a cappella groups, and vocal ensembles seeking immediate improvement and long-term growth.

testimonial.quote: Our chorus made more progress in one workshop than we had in months of regular rehearsals. Truly transformative.
testimonial.author: Sarah Mitchell

serviceOfferings.title: Masterclass Series
serviceOfferings.tagline: Deep-dive educational experiences for serious vocal musicians
serviceOfferings.description: Multi-session masterclass programs covering advanced topics in vocal performance, choral conducting, and musical interpretation. Includes performance opportunities, individual coaching, and collaborative learning with fellow participants.

testimonial.quote: The masterclass experience was worth every penny. I left with practical tools I use in every rehearsal.
testimonial.author: David Rodriguez
testimonial.role: Choral Director, San Francisco Gay Men's Chorus

serviceOfferings.title: Custom Arrangements
serviceOfferings.tagline: Professional vocal arrangements tailored to your ensemble's unique sound
serviceOfferings.description: Commission custom vocal arrangements for your choir or a cappella group. Whether you need a fresh take on a beloved classic or an original arrangement of a contemporary hit, receive professional-quality charts that showcase your ensemble's strengths.
features: Sheet music in PDF and digital format
idealFor: A cappella groups seeking signature sounds

testimonial.quote: The custom arrangement we commissioned became our signature piece. It's perfectly suited to our group's voice and style.
testimonial.author: Emily Thompson
